N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 197.7 - Guide identification

State Regulations
(a) The
department will provide to each licensed guide at the time of licensing, a
license certificate, a wallet-size license card and a metal badge to be worn
while guiding. (b) Those licensed
to guide for whitewater rafting and canoeing and rock and ice climbing will be
issued appropriate identification in addition to the metal badge. Such
identification must be worn while guiding. (c) The certifications required by section
197.3
(a) and (d)
of this Part must be in effect and current whenever a licensed guide is
guiding. Notes
